data.title: Amazing ......😀
data.text:
My husband and I went to Main Street Deli in Bracebridge today for a late lunch and it was amazing ....

Tomato and roast garlic soup with just a small amount of pesto also served with a slice of ciabatta baguette smeared with pesto was absolutely the best start to my lunch followed by a Reuben sandwich piled high with corned beef... sauerkraut ...Swiss cheese and Dijon mustard on marble rye bread .... and of course a spicy Caesar cocktail served with a large wedge of mild dill pickle and a slice of crispy apple wood smoked bacon .....
What a lunch .....

My husband chose the carrot ginger soup .... also extremely tasty ... and a grilled cheese consisting of three cheeses ... havarti ... cheddar and Gouda and added a couple of slices of smoked bacon on rye bread .... and a vodka with ruby red grapefruit cocktail 

We were served a bottle of water for the table as soon as we were seated and our server told us the five or six soups that were available today .... they all sounded so good and interesting the decision was not an easy one .....

The menu consists of many variations of creative sandwiches and includes fish and chips ... oven roasted turkey dinner ...as well as other entrees that I can't wait to check out when we go back for dinner .....

This was a very relaxed lunch with food that would not be out done by any restaurant ..... or deli ...

Our server was very relaxed and friendly making the experience outstanding ... I actually want to go back tomorrow ...😀

I would recommend this deli for couples families ... lunch with the girls .... birthday or celebration .....any occasion !!!!!

data.title: Elegant cafe with delicious food
data.text: This was my first visit.  I went because  I'd heard it was very good from several friends.  I ordered chicken fried steak which was the Thursday special for $11.00.  I split it with my son because I can't eat much.  It was an 8-10 ounce steak because I asked the waitress so I could log my calories.  We both received a full order of both side vegetables and a roll with our half steak for only a $2 split charge which is listed on the menu.  Even splitting the steak, we both had plenty to eat AND it was all delicious.  Plus, the place is elegant looking and would be a great place to take a date without spending too much.

data.title: Best Lunch in Downtown Garland!
data.text: Great food and hospitality!  Daily lunch specials are posted on their Facebook page and are delicious and reasonably priced.  Larry and Suzi are the best!

data.title: My Favorite Local Bitro
data.text: We have been dining at Main Street since it opened a frew years back. The atmosphere is casual and comfortable. Their food is consistently  delicious and they have a great little bar. The patio is nice in two seasons. We're hooked.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: The best Sandwich I've ever had!  There were four of us, we all got different things and every one wonderful. Owners operate it and take great pride in food and service.

data.title: Fantastic Family Lunch
data.text:
My cousins came in for lunch! Wow, did we hit the jackpot!!!!
Excellent foot AND service!!!!
Highly recommend~

data.title: Amazing Atmoshere
data.text: Main Street Deli has not only great food but the owners are very friendly and make every ones experience something to remember. my fiancee and I eat here maybe twice a week and it never disappoints.

data.title: Enjoyable little Deli
data.text: The people are nice and the food is good. It will put you in mind of a little New York small deli with great food and cozy environment... It's a great place for a lunch. I love the Salad with Gyro meat... yum.

data.title: Tasty Gyro
data.text: Had a really tasty gyro and great sweet potato fries.  It's quick, good prices and easy in and out.  Ask for extra sauce.

data.title: Good Cheesesteak  / Bad Hamburger
data.text:
Visited twice. The Philly Cheesesteak is good.  I absolutely CANNOT recommend the hamburger. 

The burger reminded me of the tough chewy flavorless mass produced packaged hamburger patties that CostCo sells - and that is not a positive comparison. 

Nice service. Small town feel. Get the cheesesteak.

data.title: Best breakfast sandwich in town
data.text: First time I've been here and amazing experience, super friendly and welcoming. Food was great and I will be going back soon!

data.title: Quick and easy
data.text: Little bit deli little bit medeteranian. Gyro was pretty good. Falafel was good. They are quick and friendly. The prices aren't bad.

data.title: Nice lunch spot
data.text: I had the Greek chicken platter.  The chicken was good but I would have like real olives and more salad.  The hummus lacked flavor. My friend had the burger and it looked great - fries were fresh and hot.  I will return but order something different - Greek food not authentic 😧

data.title: Yummy!
data.text: I've only been here a couple of times for lunch, but each time it was FANTASTIC!  The last time I was here, it was on April 27, 2016 and a co-worker treated me to lunch for Admin. Assistant's Day.  I got a cup of the Poblano Chicken Soup and the Chicken Caesar Wrap - delicious!  I was really surprised at the amount of soup you get with a cup - it was definitely a generous portion.  I plan to go back for dinner with my hubby!

data.title: AWESOME!!!!!!!
data.text: The owner's are so friendly and the food is FABULOUS!!!!!!!! Everything on the menu is amazing and they also offer a daily special that includes a homemade soup. All of the food is fresh and wonderful!!!!!!!

data.title: Best lunch in Garland
data.text: Great food, great people & great service!!! It is like a family of friends that meet for lunch with new folks warmly welcomed.

data.title: I highly recommend this spot!!!!
data.text: A welcoming environment with very friendly staff.  Main Street Deli has amazing food all around and I love the paleo options.  Regardless of where you live, it's worth it!!

data.title: Great spot! Can't wait to go back!
data.text: Stopped in for the first time today, was craving something healthy and had the Greek Chicken Plate. First, the food was delicious and just what I was looking for (homemade hummus!!). Second, the owners Larry & Suzi knew everyone in there by name. Super friendly people who want to make sure you enjoy your time there. I'll be going back regularly. So glad I found this place so close to home.

data.title: Great place to eat
data.text: I came to downtown Garland to get lunch with my buddy and his girlfriend and I had a wonderful experience. I ordered the fried mushrooms which were crisp on the outside but juicy inside. I also got the bacon cheeseburger which was great. This place is America at its finest with an old town feel and ya can't help but feel right at home.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Best I ever have in small deil very friend make feel welcome wood come back again tell my friends a well
